Header.title: CDL ASSOCIATES LTD.
Header.paragraph: ...helping businesses succeed and grow with confidence into the future!

About.paragraph: The environment in Nigeria's economy is complex and calls for pragmatism, due diligence and professional sagacity to successfully operate in it.The complexity is encapsulated in the status of infrastructure, the floatation of the Naira, flux in the government policies, regulatory agencies.
About.paragraph2: In addition, the Nigerian economy holds a promise of huge markets, untapped mineral resources, and a huge labour force. So, the decision to invest and operate becomes momentous.At CDL, we provide the necessary skills and “know how” to assist investors to navigate successfully here in Nigeria.
About.paragraph3: CDL is a compendium of well horned and tested professionals, with diverse business experiences, all of which add up to, providing the requisite background and launch pad for investments and businesses development.
Why: Integrity: We are honest, transparent and reliable
Passion: We always deliver the best.

Services.name: HUMAN RESOURCES
Services.text: Recruitment. Placements. Evaluations. Training and Development

Services.name: FINANCIAL TRADE
Services.text: Digital Trading in Stocks, Crypto and Bitcoin
